### Base

<KitchenSink>
  <KitchenSinkGroup>
    <KitchenSinkItem label="small">
      <Buttons size="small" tabIndex="0">
        Button
      </Buttons>
    </KitchenSinkItem>
    <KitchenSinkItem label="medium (default)">
      <Buttons>Button</Buttons>
    </KitchenSinkItem>
    <KitchenSinkItem label="large">
      <Buttons size="large">Button</Buttons>
    </KitchenSinkItem>
  </KitchenSinkGroup>
</KitchenSink>
